#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int found,x,i,k=0,l=0,m=0;
	string a;
	cin>>a;
	found=0;
	x=a.length();
	if(x<5)
	printf("NO\n");
	else
	{
		for(i=0;i<x;i++)
		{
			if(a[i]>='A'&&a[i]<='Z')
			k++;
			else
			if(a[i]>='a'&&a[i]<='z')
			l++;
			else
			if(a[i]>='0'&&a[i]<='9')
			m++;
			if(l>=1&&k>=1&&m>=1)
			found=1;
		}
		if(found)
		printf("YES\n");
		else
		printf("NO\n");
	}
}
